name: Lili Rochefort
description: Lili is a versatile character with good generics, ample plus frame pressure, and the best sidestep in the game. Her strong movement and space control make her extremely difficult to pin down, and she can punish all kinds of situations with her array of damaging whiff punish launchers and quick punishment tools. With these things in mind, opponents will hesitate to press mindlessly, allowing her to approach with plus frames or mixups out of her Feisty Rabbit and backturn (BT) stances. Heat makes her pressure and mixups even more threatening, with access to arguably the best low Heat Smash in the game if she's able to get into BT. She also has good mid checks, strong oki and a terrifying wall game with many safe wall splats.

All of these strengths come at a pretty glaring cost: despite being the queen of sidesteps, Lili is prone to getting sidestepped herself, and lacks effective tracking on almost all of her moves. Her homing options tend to be highly lacking in speed and/or range. Her BT pressure is also interruptible by mid checks on block, and her lows outside of BT pose little threat damage-wise.
strengths: The best sidestep in the game, allowing her to escape situations others can't
Strong close-range poking, generic tools, and confirmable strings
Solid plus moves and fantastic wallsplats that greatly aid her pressure
Good oki with lots of moves that hit grounded
The safest low Heat Smash in the game
weaknesses: Linear moves and poor homing attacks
Short range on most reliable pokes and checks
Lows do little damage, limited mix without BT setups and/or Heat
Slow and crouchable Heat Smash outside of BT
